Title: Directs the department of health to conduct a study relating to opening a new hospital in southeast Queens
Summary: Directs the department of health to conduct a study relating to opening a new hospital in southeast Queens; requires the department of health to deliver a copy of the findings of the study conducted and any legislative recommendations to the governor and the legislature.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the department of health to conduct a study relating to the opening of a public hospital in southeast Queens; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
